bug.question: I have six legs and I like to buzz. I make honey! Who am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I like to fly near flowers.
🍯 People like to eat what I make.
🐝 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I'm small and red, and I have black spots. Children like to find me in gardens. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I am mostly red.
🐞 I am thought to be good luck.
🪴 You can find me on plants

bug.question: I hop around and I'm green. I like to eat plants and make big jumps. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I am often green.
🦗 I make a chirping sound
🌱 I like to eat leaves.

bug.question: I march in lines and work together. I can carry food many times bigger than me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I live underground.
💪 I am very strong for my size.
🧺 I carry food to my home.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then wrap myself in a cozy blanket, and then become something beautiful with wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat leaves when I am young.
🦋 I can be many different colors.
🌈 I fly around in the air.

bug.question: I am a bug that glows in the dark. You can see me on warm summer nights. Who am I?

hints.text: 💡 I light up at night.
🌃 I live in the forest.
🔥 I am not hot when I glow.

bug.question: I have many legs and spin a web. I catch other bugs for food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I trap food using silk.
🕷️ I have eight legs.
🏠 I live in my web.

bug.question: I can fly and like to drink the juice from fruit. Sometimes I am annoying and fly around your head. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I like sweet food.
🪰 I have wings and buzz.
🍇 You see me around picnics.

bug.question: I make a loud noise in the summer. I live in trees, but you usually hear me and not see me. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make a chirping noise.
🌳 I like to live in warm places and trees.
☀️ You can hear me most often in the summertime

bug.question: I like to dig in the ground and help plants grow. Birds like to eat me, but I don't have any legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🪱 I move by wiggling around.
🐦 Some birds like to eat me
🌍 I live in dirt and help the soil.

transport.question: I have wheels and go 'Vroom Vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can take you on a ride!
🚦 I need a road to drive on.
🔑 You need keys to start me.

transport.question: I float on water and can take you to faraway lands. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am very big and made of metal!
⚓️ I have an anchor to stop me from floating away.
🐦Seagulls often fly around me.

transport.question: I have two wheels and pedals that you push with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You might wear a helmet when you ride me.
🔔 I often have a bell that you can ring!
👟 You use your feet to make me move.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to different countries. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am bigger than a bird!
✈️ I take off from an airport.
💺 People sit inside me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry lots of people. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🚏 People wait for me at a station.
📣 I am very long and have many carriages.

transport.question: I am a vehicle that can help people in an emergency. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a siren.
🏥 I take people to the hospital.
🚑 I have a red cross on me.

transport.question: I am like a long vehicle that takes lots of people around the city. What am I?

hints.text: 📍 I stop to pick people up.
🚦 I drive on the roads but am much bigger.
🏫 You might take me to school.

transport.question: I fly very fast and have spinning blades on top. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
📍 I can land in small places.
👨 Pilots fly me.

transport.question: I zoom into space and explore planets far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very powerful.
👨‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🪐 I leave Earth's atmosphere.

transport.question: I carry goods and people over snowy mountains. What am I?

hints.text: 🚠 I hang high above the ground.
🌨️ People use me when it snows.
🏔️ You'll find me at a ski resort.
